1.0.name: wordpress/slidedeck-lite-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
Deprecation Notice

SlideDeck 1 Lite for WordPress is deprecated. As of 3/13/2013 we will not longer be updating this plugin, but we suggest that you consider trying SlideDeck 2 Lite for WordPress instead. SlideDeck 2 Lite has replaced SlideDeck 1 and is now our primary SlideDeck focus.

Thanks for your support! - The SlideDeck Team

The SlideDeck WordPress slider plugin allows you to easily create a content slider widget or slideshow on your WordPress blog without having to write any code. Just create a new slider with the SlideDeck control panel tool and insert the widget into your post via the WYSIWYG editor with the TinyMCE plugin SlideDeck picker.

You can also create a dynamic slider by using the Smart Slider function. Just choose your blog post criteria (recent, popular, featured), select a theme, set your o
